alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northwest Middlesex County (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 5:32PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Worcester and northwestern Middlesex Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 532 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sterling, or near Leominster, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Leominster, Fitchburg, Holden, Clinton, Pepperell, Groton, Lunenburg, Townsend, Lancaster, Rutland, Sterling, West Boylston, Ayer, Westminster, Shirley, Harvard, Ashburnham, Boylston and Princeton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northwest Middlesex County
